comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: It is also the main entrance to Christ Church College in the University of Oxford. Hard to believe, perhaps, that one of Britain's greatest architects took time out from doing his favoured Baroque-style masterpieces (as in the Sheldonian Theatre in your adjacent photo: flic.kr/p/fgT6UX), to go 'gothic' here, presumably to blend with the rest of the college here.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The chapel here was called a cathedral. Is it still?
